resources.string: Stream audio over WiFi. Make sure both devices are on the same network.

1. Enable Developer Options:
 • Go to Settings → About Phone
 • Tap "Build Number" 7 times
 • You'll see "Developer mode enabled"

2. Enable USB Debugging:
 • Go to Settings → Developer Options
 • Enable "USB Debugging"

3. Connect & Enable Tethering:
 • Connect phone to PC via USB cable
 • Go to Settings → Hotspot & Tethering
 • Enable "USB Tethering"
When enabled, your phone\'s speaker will be silenced while streaming. Audio will only play on your PC, avoiding echo and duplicate sound.

To use Bluetooth audio streaming:

1. Open the PC receiver application

2. Click on "Bluetooth" mode in the receiver

3. The PC will become discoverable as an audio device

4. On your phone, go to Settings → Bluetooth

5. Pair with the PC receiver device

6. Select it as your audio output device

7. Play any audio on your phone - it will stream to PC!
Note: Bluetooth mode requires the PC receiver to be running in Bluetooth sink mode. This provides system-wide audio streaming without needing this app to capture audio.
Audio permission is required to stream system sound.
